definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: only Pl. cstr. [[אַשְׁרֵי]] happiness, blessedness of 1Ki 10:8 + 32 t. & c. sf., v. infr.; abstr. intens. exclam. O happiness, blessedness of, [[אַשְׁרֵי אֲנׇשֶׁיךָ אַשְׁרֵי]] [[עֲבָדֶיךָ אֵלֶּה]] happy thy men, happy these thy servants; 1Ki 10:8 (= 2Ch 9:7); [[אַשְׁרֵי אֱנוֹשׁ יוֹכִיחֶנּוּ]] [[אֱלוֹהַּ]] blessed the man whom Eloah correcteth Job 5:17; [[אַשְׁרֵי תְמִימֵי דֶרֶךְ]] blessed the perfect in way Ps 119:1; [[אַשְׁרֵי בָנׇיו אַחֲרָיו]] blessed his children after him Pr 20:7; elsewhere cstr. with [[אָדָם]] Ps 32:2, Ps 84:6, Ps 84:13, Pr 3:13, Pr 8:34, Pr 28:14; with [[הַגֶּבֶר]] Ps 34:9, Ps 40:5, Ps 94:12, Ps 127:5; [[אִישׁ]]([[הָ]]) Ps 1:1, Ps 112:1; [[אֱנוֹשׁ]] Is 56:2; [[הַגּוֹי]] Ps 33:12; [[הָעָם]] Ps 89:16, Ps 144:15, Ps 144:15; before ptcp. Ps 2:12, Ps 32:1, Ps 41:2, Ps 84:5, Ps 106:3, Ps 119:2, Ps 128:1, Is 30:18, Da 12:12; before verbal clauses without relative Ps 65:5, Pr 8:32; with [[שֶׁ־]] Ps 137:8, Ps 137:9, Ps 146:5; with sf. [[אַשְׁרֶיךָ]] (for [[אֲשָׁרֶיךָ]]) O thy happiness ! De 33:29, Ps 128:2; [[אַשְׁרֵיךְ]] Ec 10:17; [[אַשְׁרֵיכֶס]] Is 32:20; [[אַשְׁרָיו]] Pr 14:21, Pr 16:20; [[אַשְׁרֵהוּ]] Pr 29:18 (on these forms v. Ges:§ 93, R. 1, E).
